Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+import EmailIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Email";
+import { Button, TextField } from "@mui/material";
+import Checkbox from "@mui/material/Checkbox";
+import FormControlLabel from "@mui/material/FormControlLabel";
+import InputAdornment from "@mui/material/InputAdornment";
+import KeyIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Key';
+import HttpsIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Https";
+import PersonIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Person';
+
+const Register = ({ handleSubmit, register, RegisterR }) => {
+  return (
+    <form
+      onSubmit={handleSubmit(RegisterR)}
+      className="column margin-se-1"
+      style={{ width: "550px" }}
+    >
+      <TextField
+        label="First Name"
+        variant="outlined"
+        className="input-b"
+        placeholder="firstname"
+        {...register("firstname")}
+        InputProps={{
+          startAdornment: (
+            <InputAdornment position="end">
+              <PersonIcon />
+            </InputAdornment>
+          ),
+        }}
+      />
+      <TextField
+        label="Last Name"
+        variant="outlined"
+        className="input-b"
+        placeholder="lastname"
+        {...register("lastname")}
+        InputProps={{
+          startAdornment: (
+            <InputAdornment position="end">
+              <PersonIcon />
+            </InputAdornment>
+          ),
+        }}
+      />
+      <TextField
+        label="Email"
+        variant="outlined"
+        placeholder="Email"
+        className="input-b"
+        {...register("email")}
+        InputProps={{
+          startAdornment: (
+            <InputAdornment position="end">
+              <EmailIcon />
+            </InputAdornment>
+          ),
+        }}
+      />
+      <TextField
+        label="Enter Password"
+        variant="outlined"
+        className="input-b"
+        placeholder="Password"
+        {...register("Enter Password")}
+        InputProps={{
+          startAdornment: (
+            <InputAdornment position="end">
+              <HttpsIcon />
+            </InputAdornment>
+          ),
+        }}
+      />
+      <TextField
+        label="Confirm Password"
+        variant="outlined"
+        className="input-b"
+        Password="Password"
+        {...register("Confirm Password")}
+        InputProps={{
+          startAdornment: (
+            <InputAdornment position="end">
+              <KeyIcon />
+            </InputAdornment>
+          ),
+        }}
+      />
+      <FormControlLabel
+        control={<Checkbox />}
+        label="Using the website, you accept the terms and conditions"
+      />
+      <Button type="submit">Register</Button>
+    </form>
+  );
+};
+
+export default Register;
